purpose: To help new developers quickly understand and start using the most popular TfL API endpoints
style_guide_highlights: Headings: Use sentence-style capitalisation (capitalise only the first word and proper nouns). Lists: Use bulleted lists for non-sequential items and numbered lists for step-by-step instructions. Do not use bold.
document structure: 1. Overview / Introduction 2. Authentication & authorisation 3. Quick start guide 4. Endpoints reference 5. Data models / Schema definitions 6. Rate limits 7. Error handling 8. Changelog / Versioning 9. Troubleshooting 10. Support 11. Terms of Use 12. Contact and Feedback
